title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Curriculum Development: Designing Experiential Marketing Education Based on Virtual Worlds

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic marketing terminology and experience with digital platforms
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Design and implement at least one marketing campaign using avatars in a virtual world platform
Write one reflective practice report (approx. 1,000 characters) based on experiential learning outcomes
Derive three actionable insights applicable to real-world marketing strategies after observing consumer behavior in virtual environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
